items/mines/deep_earth/crystal/descripti: A shard of crystal. Used in crafting recipes.
items/mines/deep_earth/crystal_berries/d: These berries have a glasslike appearance and are very sweet.
items/mines/deep_earth/crystal_rose/desc: This delicate, shimmering rose appears to be made of crystal.
items/mines/deep_earth/crystal_wing_moth: A rare Deep Earth insect. Their delicate wings reflect the light and make them sparkle.
items/mines/deep_earth/crystalline_crick: A common Deep Earth insect. The stones around it vibrate in tune with its song.
items/mines/deep_earth/deep_earthworm/de: An uncommon Deep Earth insect. It's completely unlike its surface-dwelling cousin... if you're a worm expert.
items/mines/deep_earth/earth_eel/descrip: A common medium Deep Earth fish. Doesn't seem to have a mouth, so who knows what it eats.
items/mines/deep_earth/earth_infused_sto: An uncommon artifact. This chunk of rock has taken on elemental qualities of earth.
items/mines/deep_earth/earthshroom/descr: These mushrooms grow in dense clusters, and smell strongly of earth.
items/mines/deep_earth/emerald_horned_ch: A rare large Deep Earth fish. This large fish is nearly all horn, which seems to be made of pure emerald.
items/mines/deep_earth/faceted_rock_gem/: A uncommon artifact. Despite its mesmerizing, gem-like appearance, it's just a piece of rock.
items/mines/deep_earth/gem_shard_caterpi: An uncommon Deep Earth insect. It seems to feed on crystal berries.
items/mines/deep_earth/pebble_minnow/des: A common small Deep Earth fish. The scales of these fish have taken on a pebbled texture to help it blend into its surroundings.
items/mines/deep_earth/really_round_rock: A common artifact. This naturally formed stone is unnaturally round.
items/mines/deep_earth/rock_roach/descri: An uncommon Deep Earth insect. It's cuter than you'd expect.
items/mines/deep_earth/rock_statue/descr: A rare artifact. This naturally formed stone appears to be in the shape of a human, but... surely it's just a coincidence.
items/mines/deep_earth/rockbiter/descrip: An uncommon medium Deep Earth fish. This fish has an over-developed jaw to help it grind down stone.
items/mines/deep_earth/rockroot/descript: It's hard to tell if this is part of a living plant or if it just resembles one.
items/mines/deep_earth/seriously_square_: A common artifact. This naturally formed stone is a perfect square, a true delight for a rock connoisseur.
items/mines/deep_earth/shale_grass/descr: This grass only looks like it's made of rock. Very tough to cut.
items/mines/deep_earth/shardfin/descript: An uncommon small Deep Earth fish. This fish's sleek fin has an iridescent shimmer.
